name: Emerald Green Kanjivaram Silk Saree
description: A magnificent Kanjivaram silk saree in a deep emerald green, featuring intricate golden zari work in traditional temple patterns. Perfect for weddings and grand occasions.

name: Royal Blue Banarasi Silk Saree
description: Feel like royalty in this stunning Banarasi saree. The rich blue silk is adorned with elaborate silver thread work, creating a breathtaking floral jaal design.

name: Sunset Orange Chiffon Saree
description: Light and airy, this chiffon saree in a vibrant sunset orange is ideal for summer parties. It features a delicate sequin border that adds a touch of sparkle.

name: Classic Ivory Cotton Saree
description: Elegance in simplicity. This handloom cotton saree in a classic ivory white comes with a contrasting red and black temple border. Comfortable for all-day wear.

name: Magenta Georgette Saree
description: A bold and beautiful georgette saree in a striking magenta pink. It is embellished with subtle mirror work, making it a modern and chic choice for any event.

name: Charcoal Black Tussar Silk Saree
description: Sophisticated and earthy, this Tussar silk saree in charcoal black features traditional Kantha stitch embroidery, depicting scenes from nature.

name: Golden Tissue Saree
description: Glimmer and shine in this exquisite golden tissue saree. It's lightweight and has a lustrous texture, complemented by a minimalist maroon border.

name: Lavender Crepe Saree
description: A soft and flowy crepe saree in a delicate lavender shade. Adorned with fine crystal work, it offers a graceful and contemporary look.

name: Teal Blue Paithani Saree
description: A traditional Maharashtrian Paithani saree in a rich teal blue. The pallu is a masterpiece of colorful silk threads woven into peacock motifs.

name: Crimson Red Bandhani Saree
description: Celebrate tradition with this vibrant crimson red Bandhani saree from Gujarat. The tie-dye patterns are handcrafted, making each piece unique.

name: Mustard Yellow Linen Saree
description: Stay cool and chic in this mustard yellow linen saree. It features a simple silver border and is perfect for casual outings or office wear.

name: Pastel Green Organza Saree
description: Sheer and elegant, this organza saree in a soft pastel green is hand-painted with delicate floral motifs, offering a dreamy and ethereal vibe.

name: Deep Maroon Velvet Saree
description: A luxurious velvet saree in a deep maroon hue, perfect for winter weddings. It is richly embroidered with zardozi work along the border.

name: Sky Blue Chikankari Saree
description: An exquisite georgette saree from Lucknow in a pleasant sky blue, featuring intricate Chikankari hand-embroidery all over.

name: Peach Satin Saree
description: Smooth and glossy, this satin saree in a lovely peach color drapes beautifully. It is accented with a pearl-encrusted border for a touch of glamour.

name: Bottle Green Raw Silk Saree
description: This raw silk saree in a rich bottle green has a natural texture and sheen. It is paired with a contrasting pink and gold border.

name: Beige and Gold Kerala Kasavu Saree
description: The traditional Kerala Kasavu saree in its classic beige and gold combination. Made from pure cotton, it's a symbol of grace and cultural heritage.

name: Wine Purple Net Saree
description: A glamorous net saree in a deep wine purple. It's heavily embellished with stone and bead work, making it perfect for receptions and cocktail parties.

name: Off-White Jamdani Saree
description: A fine muslin Jamdani saree from Bengal in a subtle off-white. The intricate, hand-woven geometric patterns are a testament to artisanal skill.

name: Burnt Orange Art Silk Saree
description: A vibrant art silk saree in a warm burnt orange. It features printed Kalamkari-inspired motifs and a simple zari border.

name: Royal Kanjivaram Brocade Saree
description: A masterpiece of Kanjivaram weaving, this brocade saree features all-over gold zari work in peacock and floral designs. A true heirloom piece.

name: Sea Green Chanderi Saree
description: Lightweight and glossy, this Chanderi saree in a calming sea green is perfect for daytime functions. It is decorated with silver butis and a floral border.

name: Fuchsia Pink Patola Silk Saree
description: An authentic Patan Patola saree in fuchsia pink, featuring the intricate double ikat weave. Known for its vibrant colors and geometric patterns.

name: Navy Blue Georgette Saree with Ruffles
description: A modern take on the classic saree. This navy blue georgette saree features trendy ruffle detailing along the border and pallu, adding a playful touch.

name: Earthy Brown Khadi Saree
description: Embrace sustainability with this hand-spun, hand-woven Khadi saree in an earthy brown. It has a rustic charm and is incredibly comfortable.

name: Ruby Red Banarasi Georgette Saree
description: A beautiful fusion of Banarasi and Georgette, this ruby red saree is lightweight yet has the opulence of traditional zari work.

name: Mint Green Satin-Crepe Saree
description: This saree in a refreshing mint green combines the smoothness of satin with the fall of crepe. It has a minimalist design with a subtle sheen.

name: Black and Gold Sequins Saree
description: Ready for the spotlight? This dazzling black georgette saree is fully covered in shimmering gold sequins, ensuring you'll turn heads.

name: Coral Pink Kota Doria Saree
description: Lightweight and breathable, this Kota Doria saree from Rajasthan in a lovely coral pink is perfect for warm weather. It features the characteristic square-check pattern.

name: Ivory and Red Garad Silk Saree
description: A traditional Garad silk saree from Bengal, with a stark ivory body and a rich red border and pallu. Often worn during religious ceremonies.

name: Turquoise Blue Mysore Silk Saree
description: Known for its shine and durability, this Mysore silk saree in a stunning turquoise blue features a solid gold zari border, exuding pure elegance.

name: Sunshine Yellow Leheriya Saree
description: Brighten up any day with this chiffon Leheriya saree from Rajasthan. The wave-like tie-dye patterns in sunshine yellow are cheerful and vibrant.

name: Pistachio Green Silk Cotton Saree
description: A comfortable blend of silk and cotton, this saree in a soft pistachio green is perfect for daily wear. It features a simple thread-work border.

name: Grey and Pink Dual-Tone Saree
description: A contemporary soft silk saree featuring a dual-tone effect of grey and pink. The colors shift and play with the light, creating a unique look.

name: Maroon and Gold Korial Saree
description: Another Bengali classic, the Korial saree features a white or off-white body with a heavy gold and maroon border, ideal for festive occasions.

name: Bright Orange Kanchi Cotton Saree
description: Handwoven Kanchi cotton saree in a brilliant orange, with a contrasting purple border featuring annapakshi (divine swan) motifs.

name: Indigo Blue Dabu Print Saree
description: A beautiful cotton saree featuring the traditional Dabu mud-resist printing technique from Rajasthan, in a classic indigo blue.

name: Rose Pink Organza with Embroidery
description: A delicate and romantic organza saree in rose pink. It is finely embroidered with silk threads, creating a beautiful floral design.

name: Forest Green Ghicha Silk Saree
description: Ghicha silk, known for its textured feel, in a deep forest green. This saree has a natural, raw appeal and a striped pallu.

name: Black and White Kalamkari Saree
description: A stunning cotton saree hand-painted with Kalamkari art, depicting mythological stories in a striking black and white palette.

name: Electric Blue Sequin Net Saree
description: Make a bold statement with this electric blue net saree, embellished with countless sequins for a glamorous, party-ready look.

name: Cream Tussar Saree with Madhubani Art
description: A sophisticated cream Tussar silk saree, with its pallu hand-painted with intricate Madhubani art from Bihar.

name: Hot Pink and Orange Kanjivaram Saree
description: A vibrant Kanjivaram silk saree with a hot pink body and a contrasting orange border and pallu, featuring traditional gold zari motifs.

name: Steel Grey Chiffon Saree with Pearls
description: A chic and modern chiffon saree in a steel grey color, delicately bordered with small, elegant pearls.

name: Parrot Green Banarasi Saree
description: A bright and cheerful Banarasi silk saree in parrot green, woven with gold meenakari work for a festive touch.

name: Burgundy Georgette Saree
description: An elegant georgette saree in a deep burgundy shade, featuring subtle thread embroidery for a refined look.

name: Ochre Yellow Muga Silk Saree
description: A rare and luxurious Muga silk saree from Assam, known for its natural golden sheen and durability. A timeless investment.

name: Lilac Purple Chanderi Silk Saree
description: A beautiful Chanderi silk saree in a soft lilac purple, with gold and silver butis scattered across the body.

name: Classic Red and White Tant Saree
description: The quintessential Bengali cotton Tant saree, with a crisp white body and a vibrant red border. Lightweight and perfect for hot climates.

name: Olive Green Printed Crepe Saree
description: A modern crepe saree in an olive green hue, featuring abstract digital prints for a contemporary and artistic look.

name: Sapphire Blue Kanjivaram
description: A rich sapphire blue Kanjivaram silk saree with a contrasting pink border, woven with intricate gold zari checks.

name: Peach and Gold Banarasi Tissue Saree
description: A delicate and shimmering Banarasi tissue saree in a peach and gold combination, lightweight and perfect for evening soirees.

name: Crimson Red Georgette with Zari Border
description: A flowing crimson red georgette saree, enhanced by a broad, ornate gold zari border for a regal touch.

name: Black Mysore Crepe Silk Saree
description: The epitome of elegance, this black Mysore crepe silk saree has a butter-soft texture and a slim, solid gold border.

name: Sunshine Yellow Cotton Silk Saree
description: A bright and sunny cotton silk saree in yellow, with a simple green border, making it ideal for festive daytime wear.

name: Royal Purple Banarasi Handloom Saree
description: A majestic handloom Banarasi saree in royal purple, featuring intricate gold zari work in a traditional paisley pattern.

name: Off-White and Pink Floral Organza Saree
description: A sheer off-white organza saree with beautiful pink floral digital prints, creating a modern and feminine aesthetic.

name: Bottle Green and Maroon Sambalpuri Ikat Saree
description: A traditional Sambalpuri Ikat silk saree from Odisha, in a combination of bottle green and maroon, featuring the characteristic hazy patterns.

name: Flame Orange and Red Bandhani Saree
description: A fiery combination of orange and red in a traditional Bandhani (tie-dye) georgette saree, perfect for celebrations.

name: Light Blue Linen Saree with Silver Zari
description: A soothing light blue linen saree, accented with a shimmering silver zari border for a touch of understated elegance.

name: Ivory White and Gold Korial Silk Saree
description: The epitome of Bengali grace, this Korial silk saree has a pure ivory white body and a rich, traditional gold border.

name: Pastel Pink Georgette Saree
description: A soft and feminine pastel pink georgette saree, with a delicate lace border, perfect for daytime events.

name: Turquoise and Silver Chanderi Saree
description: A stunning turquoise Chanderi silk-cotton saree with elegant silver zari butis, combining tradition with a modern color palette.

name: Deep Wine Velvet Saree with Embroidery
description: A luxurious deep wine velvet saree, heavily embroidered with intricate threadwork and sequins, ideal for grand evening functions.

name: Mustard and Black Ikkat Cotton Saree
description: A handwoven cotton saree from Telangana, featuring bold mustard and black Ikkat patterns for a striking, ethnic look.

name: Teal and Gold Banarasi Silk Lehenga Saree
description: A pre-stitched lehenga saree in teal Banarasi silk, with a magnificent gold zari border and pallu, offering convenience and grandeur.

name: Seafoam Green Chiffon Saree
description: A light and airy chiffon saree in a refreshing seafoam green, with a simple satin border for a clean, elegant look.

name: Royal Blue and Pink Kanjivaram Half Saree
description: A traditional South Indian half saree (Langa Voni) set in royal blue and pink Kanjivaram silk, perfect for young women.

name: Black and Red Tussar Silk Saree
description: A classic combination of black and red on a textured Tussar silk base, with traditional tribal motifs painted on the pallu.

name: Lemon Yellow Organza Saree
description: A crisp and sheer organza saree in a zesty lemon yellow, with delicate white thread embroidery for a fresh, summery feel.

name: Emerald Green Velvet Saree
description: A regal emerald green velvet saree with a scalloped border, embellished with crystals for a touch of sparkle.

name: Peach and Silver Net Saree
description: A dreamy peach net saree, intricately embroidered with silver thread and sequins for a sophisticated party look.

name: Maroon and Beige Kalamkari Silk Saree
description: A beautiful silk saree featuring hand-painted Kalamkari art in maroon and beige, depicting scenes from the Ramayana.

name: Indigo and White Shibori Saree
description: A crepe saree with beautiful Shibori tie-dye patterns in indigo and white, offering a unique and artistic flair.

name: Coral and Gold Tissue Saree
description: A lightweight and lustrous tissue saree in a stunning coral and gold weave, perfect for making a subtle yet grand statement.

name: Deep Green Kanjivaram with Red Border
description: A classic Kanjivaram silk saree in deep green, contrasted with a striking red and gold temple border.

name: Light Pink Chiffon Saree with Floral Print
description: A breezy and romantic light pink chiffon saree, adorned with delicate floral prints for a fresh and feminine look.

name: Grey and Yellow Tussar Silk Saree
description: An unusual and elegant combination of grey and yellow on a textured Tussar silk base, with geometric block prints.

name: Navy Blue and Gold Banarasi Georgette Saree
description: A lightweight Banarasi georgette saree in navy blue, featuring all-over gold zari butis and a heavy pallu.

name: Bright Pink and Green Kanchi Cotton
description: A vibrant handwoven Kanchi cotton saree in bright pink with a contrasting green border, featuring peacock motifs.

name: Classic Maroon Banarasi Saree
description: A timeless maroon Banarasi silk saree with intricate gold zari work, a must-have for every bridal trousseau.

name: Pastel Blue Organza with Pearl Work
description: A dreamy pastel blue organza saree, delicately embellished with scattered pearls for a touch of ethereal charm.

name: Black and Silver Sequined Georgette Saree
description: A glamorous black georgette saree, adorned with shimmering silver sequins for a dazzling cocktail party look.

name: Cream and Red Baluchari Silk Saree
description: A traditional Baluchari silk saree from Bengal, with a cream body and a red pallu woven with mythological narratives.

name: Yellow Chiffon Leheriya Saree
description: A vibrant yellow chiffon saree with traditional Rajasthani leheriya (wave) patterns, perfect for a sunny day.

name: Purple and Gold Kanjivaram Saree
description: A regal purple Kanjivaram silk saree with a magnificent gold zari border and pallu, featuring annapakshi motifs.

name: Mint Green and Silver Tissue Saree
description: A shimmering mint green tissue saree, woven with silver threads for a cool, contemporary, and glamorous look.

name: Red and White Printed Satin Saree
description: A smooth satin saree with bold red and white abstract prints, perfect for a modern and chic statement.

name: Teal Blue Raw Silk Saree
description: A rich teal blue raw silk saree with a natural slub texture, complemented by a simple, elegant gold border.

name: Beige and Black Block-Printed Cotton Saree
description: A soft cotton saree in beige, featuring traditional hand block prints in black for a classic, earthy appeal.

name: Magenta Pink Banarasi Georgette Saree
description: A lightweight magenta pink Banarasi georgette saree with all-over silver zari work, combining comfort with opulence.

name: Sky Blue Chiffon with Mirror Work
description: A breezy sky blue chiffon saree, adorned with delicate mirror work along the border for a touch of Rajasthani charm.

description: A traditional Maharashtrian Paithani saree in golden yellow with a red border, featuring a magnificent peacock motif on the pallu.

name: Charcoal Grey and Silver Net Saree
description: A sophisticated charcoal grey net saree, elegantly embroidered with silver thread and stones for a chic evening look.

name: Orange and Pink Half and Half Saree
description: A vibrant half and half art silk saree, with the pleats in orange and the pallu in pink, creating a fun and festive look.

description: A rich bottle green silk saree with a contrasting gold border, embodying classic elegance and grace.
